com.b2international.snowowl.core.config

Class SnowOwlConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.commons.config.Configuration
      • com.b2international.snowowl.core.config.SnowOwlConfiguration

  • public class SnowOwlConfiguration
extends Configuration
    Snow Owl Application configuration class. The configuration can be manually constructed or it can be constructed from a JSON file using a ConfigurationFactory.
    Since:
    3.3
